report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-22393 IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-22393 IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty Vulnerability
text: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 22.0.0.5 , with the adminCenter-1.0 feature configured, could allow an authenticated user to issue a request to obtain the status of HTTP/HTTPS ports which are accessible by the application server.
